headline: Macy's Digital Acceleration Strengthens Omni-Channel Growth Momentum
summary: Digital innovation and omni-channel upgrades help Macy's post its best comparable sales growth in the past 12 quarters.

headline: Deckers Outdoor (DECK): Assessing Valuation as Analyst Views, Trade Uncertainty, and Buyback Shape Investor Sentiment
summary: Deckers Outdoor stock is moving into the spotlight as investors weigh upbeat sales trends in the HOKA and UGG brands, growing competitive threats, and ongoing trade uncertainty ahead of the company’s quarterly earnings release. See our latest analysis for Deckers Outdoor. Deckers Outdoor’s share price has been under pressure lately, with a sharp 17.0% drop over the past month and a year-to-date slide of 51.9% despite headlines celebrating steady sales growth, brand momentum, and a major share...
